resources.string:
DexGuard RASP checks have been injected into this sample.

You can enable or disable certain checks in the dexguard-project.txt configuration file.


You can enable or disable "continue-on-callback" behaviour for certain checks in the dexguard-project.txt configuration file.


You can also add your own custom callback, as demonstrated in the configuration file.


If you want to enable ThreatCast integration please refer to the DexGuard documentation.
